You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image features a **black bear** in a **wooded area**. The bear is standing on all fours, its body facing the camera, and its head is turned to the left. The bear's fur is a deep black color, and it appears to be in motion, possibly walking through the underbrush. The background of the image is filled with various shades of green, indicating a dense forest. There are also some yellow flowers scattered throughout the scene, adding a pop of color
